privacyPolicy.title: Ù¾Ø±Ø§Ø¦ÛŒÙˆÛŒØ³ÛŒ Ù¾Ø§Ù„ÛŒØ³ÛŒ
privacyPolicy.intro: Barakah Furqan respects your privacy. This policy explains what data and permissions are used to provide app features.
privacyPolicy.section1Body:
We do not require account registration and do not ask for personal identifiers such as name or phone number. However, the app may process:

â€¢ Location (approximate/precise): for Qibla direction and prayer times.
â€¢ Microphone: for recitation (tilawah) practice.
â€¢ Internet connection: to fetch Quran data and prayer schedules.
â€¢ Technical usage data (e.g., error logs/performance) if available from the system/SDK to improve stability.
privacyPolicy.section2Body:
â€¢ ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION / ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION: calculate Qibla direction and prayer times.
â€¢ RECORD_AUDIO: recitation (tilawah) practice.
â€¢ INTERNET: fetch Quran data, tafsir/translations, and prayer schedules.
privacyPolicy.section3Body:
We use data to:

â€¢ Run core features on your device.
â€¢ Improve reliability, quality, and support.
â€¢ Diagnose and fix technical issues.
privacyPolicy.section4Body:
â€¢ Some data (e.g., language preference, cached schedules) is stored locally on your device.
â€¢ We do not store your data on Barakah Furqan servers unless explicitly stated in the future.
â€¢ You can clear local data by clearing app data or uninstalling the app.
privacyPolicy.section5Body:
â€¢ We do not sell your data.
â€¢ Some features use thirdâ€‘party services (e.g., prayer time providers or speech recognition) that process data according to their own policies.
â€¢ We aim to use trusted services relevant to app functionality.
privacyPolicy.section6Body: We take reasonable measures to protect your data. However, no system is 100% secure.
privacyPolicy.section7Body: The app is intended for general audiences and does not knowingly collect personal data from children.
privacyPolicy.section8Body:
You may:

â€¢ Deny permissions (location/microphone), but some features may not work.
â€¢ Remove local data by clearing app data or uninstalling the app.
privacyPolicy.section9Body: We may update this policy. Significant changes will be communicated via app updates or release notes.
privacyPolicy.section10Body:
If you have questions about this policy, contact:

Email: dgirsandi@gmail.com
